title: Store Design
subtitle: Customize your store design
description: Customize the design, colors, themes and visual appearance of your store.

hero.title: Hero Image/Video
hero.description: This image will be displayed at the top of your store as a cover. Use a high-quality square image or video to highlight your brand.

carousel.title: Carousel Images
carousel.description: Upload up to {maxImages} images for your store's main carousel. We recommend horizontal images of 1920x600px for best display.
carousel.maxImagesError: You already have the maximum of {max} images

tips.drag: • You can drag images to reorder them

customSections.title: Custom Sections
customSections.description: Add and customize additional sections for your store.

gallery.title: Theme Gallery
gallery.description: Choose the perfect design for your store. Each theme is optimized to offer the best experience for your customers and reflect your brand's personality.

baseDefault.name: Base Theme
baseDefault.description: A clean and professional design that adapts to all types of businesses. Perfect for starting your online store.

mobilemodern.name: Mobile Modern
mobilemodern.description: Mobile-optimized design with vibrant colors and a modern touch experience. Perfect for young audiences.

minimalSushi.name: Minimal Sushi
minimalSushi.description: Minimalist design with emphasis on typography and white space. Perfect for fashion and lifestyle stores.

petFriendly.name: Pet Friendly
petFriendly.description: Cheerful and colorful theme perfect for pet stores and animal-related products.

minimalClean.name: Minimal Clean
minimalClean.description: Ultra-minimalist design with clean lines and wide spaces. Perfect for premium products.

elegantBoutique.name: Elegant Boutique
elegantBoutique.description: Sophisticated and elegant design inspired by luxury boutiques. Perfect for premium brands and high-end products.

branding.title: Branding
branding.subtitle: Customize colors and visual identity of your store
branding.logoUploadHint: Drag an image here or click to select
branding.storePhotoHint: Optional: Photo of your physical store
branding.storePhotoUploadHint: Drag an image here or click to select
branding.fileFormat: PNG, JPG or JPEG up to 5MB
